title: 1890 Constitution and Playing Rules of the National League
author: 4scuda

posts.post_title: 1890 Constitution and Playing Rules of the National League
posts.post_content: I am thinning out my collection so I am offering this early rule book.  The cover is pretty frail. The front cover unfortunately came loose while I was trying to get a picture inside the book. Looks complete has several pages of spalding advertisements at the end. $150 or best offer.
